item.title: "Billions Of Stories": A Minecraft Movie Already Perfectly Set Up An Epic Franchise
item.description: A Minecraft Movie sequel has several storytelling options, but the blockbuster already set up the perfect continuation of the franchise.

item.title: If You Loved Flow, You'll Probably Want To Watch This Upcoming Video Game Adaptation That Could Be Just As Good
item.description: If you loved the Oscar-winning animated masterpiece Flow, then this upcoming video game adaptation about a stray cat is the movie for you.

item.title: In 3 Godfather Movies, The Corleone Family Only Broke Its "Business, Not Personal" Rule One Time
item.description: Across The Godfather trilogy, the Corleone family only broke their hard-and-fast rule of not mixing personal drama with business one time.
